about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION

In a world overrun by the psychological and social turmoil engineered by ruthless tech giants, humanity stands on the brink. These corporations, driven by insatiable greed, manipulate entire populations to secure their immense profits.

Human connections and emotions have been surrendered to a pervasive technology that has fused with every aspect of life. Social unrest and a barrage of false news have become the ultimate weapons, wielded by companies and governments alike to destabilize democracies and control the masses.

A dystopian alternative present time? No, this is the world we all live in today!

Wild Radio Flux takes players back to a time filled with vibrant music, colors, imagination, and endless fun, a time when people left their homes every day to embark on new adventures, embracing the thrill of life and dreaming of their own unique futures.

Wild Radio Flux invites you to travel back, at least for fun, to a hypothetical "1985," where it all began and when we all believed that technology could really democratize society. It will be your mission to collect as many musical and cultural items as possible to stop the dystopian technological drift, before tech giants and big data corporations have infiltrated our lives with seemingly "harmless" websites, relentlessly driving us to transfer our existence onto their servers.

GAMEPLAY

Explore diverse stages, unlock new levels, and advance through the game as you collect legendary items and power up your hero. Discover and unleash a range of unique weapons while immersing yourself in the nostalgic dream of 16-bit gaming, where music and adventure collide in an endless, unforgettable experience.

THE POWER OF DOUBLE JUMP AND DOUBLE STEP

EMPOWER YOUR WEAPONS

Based on the character you choose you can empower your crazy weapons while playing.

PLANNED CHARACTERS

Wild Radio Flux is born to be extended with seasons and characters like DLC. Just some of the characters we are working about :)
